engChrName: Th-That bus has been surrounded by monsters!
engSearchText: Th-That bus has been surrounded by monsters!
jpnChrName: ……！？ バスが魔獣に……！？
jpnSearchText:
……！？
バスが魔獣に……！？

engChrName: Wolves! I count six, seven...eight!
engSearchText: Wolves! I count six, seven...eight!
jpnChrName: 狼型魔獣──！ 数は７、いえ８です！
jpnSearchText:
狼型魔獣──！
数は７、いえ８です！

engChrName: Bah. I hate workin' for free.
engSearchText: Bah. I hate workin' for free.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、タダ働きは 流儀じゃないんだが……
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、タダ働きは
流儀じゃないんだが……

engChrName: You can't say that! How can you stand by when there are people in danger?!
engSearchText:
You can't say that! How can you stand by when there
are people in danger?!
jpnChrName: だ、駄目ですよ！？ 何とか助けないと──
jpnSearchText:
だ、駄目ですよ！？
何とか助けないと──

engChrName: I know, I know. Watch yourself if you're gonna pitch in.
engSearchText:
I know, I know. Watch yourself if you're gonna
pitch in.
jpnChrName: わーってるっての。 サポートするなら気をつけろ。
jpnSearchText:
わーってるっての。
サポートするなら気をつけろ。

engChrName: You in or you out, Feri?
engSearchText: You in or you out, Feri?
jpnChrName: 依頼人──いやフェリ。 お前さんはどうする？
jpnSearchText:
依頼人──いやフェリ。
お前さんはどうする？

engChrName: What do you think? I'm in!
engSearchText: What do you think? I'm in!
jpnChrName: 言わずもがな──です。
jpnSearchText: 言わずもがな──です。

engChrName: What is that?
engSearchText: What is that?
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: It's a rifleblade used in our corps.
engSearchText: It's a rifleblade used in our corps.
jpnChrName: 戦士団で使われている 《アサルトソード》といいます。
jpnSearchText:
戦士団で使われている
《アサルトソード》といいます。

engChrName: I'll use it to keep both of you safe. Now may Arusha watch over us!
engSearchText:
I'll use it to keep both of you safe. Now may Arusha
watch over us!
jpnChrName: お二人はわたしが守ります。 ──焔と女神（アルーシャ）の加護を！
jpnSearchText:
お二人はわたしが守ります。
──焔と女神（アルーシャ）の加護を！

engChrName: Okay, then. Let's do this!
engSearchText: Okay, then. Let's do this!
jpnChrName: ハッ、いいだろう。 そんじゃあ出るぞ──！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、いいだろう。
そんじゃあ出るぞ──！

engChrName: That was the last of them.
engSearchText: That was the last of them.
jpnChrName: ──クリア。 残敵は見当たりません。
jpnSearchText:
──クリア。
残敵は見当たりません。

engChrName: Heh. Not bad.
engSearchText: Heh. Not bad.
jpnChrName: ハッ、上出来だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、上出来だ。

engChrName: I already know how good Van is, but I'm amazed at how fast you are, Feri!
engSearchText:
I already know how good Van is, but I'm amazed at
how fast you are, Feri!
jpnChrName: すごい……ヴァンさんもですけど フェリちゃんの身のこなしも……！
jpnSearchText:
すごい……ヴァンさんもですけど
フェリちゃんの身のこなしも……！

engChrName: Are all Warriors of Kruga like that?
engSearchText: Are all Warriors of Kruga like that?
jpnChrName: これがクルガの戦士、なんですね！
jpnSearchText: これがクルガの戦士、なんですね！

engChrName: N-No way! I'm still a rookie! Most of them are much better than me.
engSearchText:
N-No way! I'm still a rookie! Most of them are much
better than me.
jpnChrName: わ、わたしなんて戦士としては 半人前もいいところで……
jpnSearchText:
わ、わたしなんて戦士としては
半人前もいいところで……

engChrName: And your arts were awesome, Agnès! So is your staff!
engSearchText: And your arts were awesome, Agnès! So is your staff!
jpnChrName: アニエスさんもありがとうございます。 アーツもですけど、その杖も凄いですね……！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんもありがとうございます。
アーツもですけど、その杖も凄いですね……！

engChrName: Aww, thank you. It's called an orbal staff, and...
engSearchText: Aww, thank you. It's called an orbal staff, and...
jpnChrName: ふふっ、これは導力杖（オーバルスタッフ）と言いまして……
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、これは導力杖（オーバルスタッフ）と言いまして……

engChrName: Come on, now.
engSearchText: Come on, now.
jpnChrName: やれやれ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ。

engChrName: (Wish I knew what was up with those monsters. It was almost like—)
engSearchText:
(Wish I knew what was up with those monsters.
It was almost like—)
jpnChrName: （……しかし妙だな。   今の魔獣ども、まるで──）
jpnSearchText:
（……しかし妙だな。
今の魔獣ども、まるで──）

engChrName: Hellooo! You three over there!
engSearchText: Hellooo! You three over there!
jpnChrName: おーい、あんたたち！
jpnSearchText: おーい、あんたたち！

engChrName: Are you okay? We really owe you one!
engSearchText: Are you okay? We really owe you one!
jpnChrName: よかった、助かったよ……！
jpnSearchText: よかった、助かったよ……！

engChrName: We had to pull over because of engine trouble, and the next thing we knew, we were surrounded!
engSearchText:
We had to pull over because of engine trouble, and
the next thing we knew, we were surrounded!
jpnChrName: エンジントラブルで停めてたら いきなり現れて囲まれちゃってさ！
jpnSearchText:
エンジントラブルで停めてたら
いきなり現れて囲まれちゃってさ！

engChrName: I have to say, you've got some incredible combat skills!
engSearchText:
I have to say, you've got some incredible
combat skills!
jpnChrName: いや～、見事だなアンタら……！
jpnSearchText: いや～、見事だなアンタら……！

engChrName: What are you, bracers?
engSearchText: What are you, bracers?
jpnChrName: やっぱり遊撃士だったりするのかい？
jpnSearchText: やっぱり遊撃士だったりするのかい？

engChrName: Nah. Just ordinary passersby.
engSearchText: Nah. Just ordinary passersby.
jpnChrName: いや、ただの通りすがりでね。
jpnSearchText: いや、ただの通りすがりでね。

engChrName: You work for West Calvard Transport, right? Lemme give you my card.
engSearchText:
You work for West Calvard Transport, right?
Lemme give you my card.
jpnChrName: 《西カルバード交通》の社員か。 自己紹介しておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
《西カルバード交通》の社員か。
自己紹介しておくぜ。

engChrName: Arkride Solutions?
engSearchText: Arkride Solutions?
jpnChrName: 《アークライド解決事務所》……？
jpnSearchText: 《アークライド解決事務所》……？

engChrName: I'm just a guy who helps people with their problems. Not affiliated with the Bracer Guild.
engSearchText:
I'm just a guy who helps people with their problems.
Not affiliated with the Bracer Guild.
jpnChrName: ギルドとは別口の、色んな相談や トラブルに対処する便利屋でな。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドとは別口の、色んな相談や
トラブルに対処する便利屋でな。

engChrName: Even open to fightin' monsters and stuff like I did just there—for a price.
engSearchText:
Even open to fightin' monsters and stuff like I did
just there—for a price.
jpnChrName: 今みたいな切った張ったなんかも “有料”で請け負っている。
jpnSearchText:
今みたいな切った張ったなんかも
“有料”で請け負っている。

engChrName: Wait...
engSearchText: Wait...
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: Umm... Van...
engSearchText: Umm... Van...
jpnChrName: あの、ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: あの、ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Hate to come across like this, but you would've been screwed without us, right?
engSearchText:
Hate to come across like this, but you would've been
screwed without us, right?
jpnChrName: 緊急時だったから押し売りになるが 助かっただろ？
jpnSearchText:
緊急時だったから押し売りになるが
助かっただろ？

engChrName: So if you could let your company know that and have them foot the bill, that'd be great.
engSearchText:
So if you could let your company know that and have
them foot the bill, that'd be great.
jpnChrName: 会社に連絡して少しばかりの “気持ち”を掛け合っといてくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
会社に連絡して少しばかりの
“気持ち”を掛け合っといてくれよ。

engChrName: What?! But the police or the guild would never—
engSearchText: What?! But the police or the guild would never—
jpnChrName: ええっ！？　でも警察とか ギルドだったらそんな事は──
jpnSearchText:
ええっ！？　でも警察とか
ギルドだったらそんな事は──

engChrName: Well, we ain't cops or bracers. And you can't keep the lights on with a thank-you.
engSearchText:
Well, we ain't cops or bracers. And you can't keep the
lights on with a thank-you.
jpnChrName: 悪いがボランティアを やってるわけじゃねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
悪いがボランティアを
やってるわけじゃねえからな。

engChrName: Not tryin' to scam you here—I just want a fair price for our services. We'll even escort you to town to finish the job.
engSearchText:
Not tryin' to scam you here—I just want a fair price
for our services. We'll even escort you to town to
finish the job.
jpnChrName: 常識の範囲内でいい──今ならオマケに 最寄りまで車で護衛していくからさ。
jpnSearchText:
常識の範囲内でいい──今ならオマケに
最寄りまで車で護衛していくからさ。

engChrName: Wouldn't imagine you're in a rush to get attacked AGAIN on the road, are you?
engSearchText:
Wouldn't imagine you're in a rush to get attacked
AGAIN on the road, are you?
jpnChrName: ………また襲われたくねえだろ？
jpnSearchText: ………また襲われたくねえだろ？

engChrName: Hmm... You got me there.
engSearchText: Hmm... You got me there.
jpnChrName: ううっ……それを言われると。
jpnSearchText: ううっ……それを言われると。

engChrName: *sigh* This is so inappropriate...
engSearchText: *sigh* This is so inappropriate...
jpnChrName: ……もう、ヴァンさんったら。
jpnSearchText: ……もう、ヴァンさんったら。

engChrName: I can see where you're coming from, but I don't think it's inappropriate at all.
engSearchText:
I can see where you're coming from, but I don't think
it's inappropriate at all.
jpnChrName: えと…… でも当然といえば当然かもです。
jpnSearchText:
えと……
でも当然といえば当然かもです。

engChrName: Whether it's the water we drink or the security to see we're safe from harm, nothing in life is free.
engSearchText:
Whether it's the water we drink or the security to see
we're safe from harm, nothing in life is free.
jpnChrName: 安全も水もタダではないですし、 持てる者は支払う義務があります。
jpnSearchText:
安全も水もタダではないですし、
持てる者は支払う義務があります。

engChrName: I...suppose so. (I wonder if everyone from the Central East has such a practical mindset.)
engSearchText:
I...suppose so.
(I wonder if everyone from the Central East has such
a practical mindset.)
jpnChrName: なるほど……確かに。 （中東部ならそれも当然、ですか。）
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……確かに。
（中東部ならそれも当然、ですか。）

engChrName: All right, then. We'll hire you to take us down to Creil.
engSearchText:
All right, then. We'll hire you to take us down
to Creil.
jpnChrName: わかった、とりあえず この先のクレイユ村までは頼むよ！
jpnSearchText:
わかった、とりあえず
この先のクレイユ村までは頼むよ！

engChrName: And as soon as we arrive, I'll phone my boss.
engSearchText: And as soon as we arrive, I'll phone my boss.
jpnChrName: 到着したら通信で 会社に掛け合ってみるからさ！
jpnSearchText:
到着したら通信で
会社に掛け合ってみるからさ！

engChrName: Sounds like a plan. Now c'mon, you two—back in the truck.
engSearchText:
Sounds like a plan. Now c'mon, you two—back in
the truck.
jpnChrName: 交渉成立だな。 ──そんじゃ車に戻るぞ。
jpnSearchText:
交渉成立だな。
──そんじゃ車に戻るぞ。

engChrName: Okay!
engSearchText: Okay!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Oh, all right...
engSearchText: Oh, all right...
jpnChrName: ううっ、了解しました……
jpnSearchText: ううっ、了解しました……

engChrName: Hmm... I wasn't expecting that to be how this ended.
engSearchText: Hmm... I wasn't expecting that to be how this ended.
jpnChrName: ふう…… どうなるかと思ったけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
どうなるかと思ったけど。

engChrName: That young man's most certainly caught my attention...
engSearchText:
That young man's most certainly caught
my attention...
jpnChrName: ギルドとは別口の便利屋ねぇ。 ちょっと面白そうかな……？
jpnSearchText:
ギルドとは別口の便利屋ねぇ。
ちょっと面白そうかな……？

engChrName: This road is surrounded by so much natural beauty... and the air is so crisp and fresh.
engSearchText:
This road is surrounded by so much natural beauty...
and the air is so crisp and fresh.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、自然が豊かな街道ですね…… 空気が美味しい気がします。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、自然が豊かな街道ですね……
空気が美味しい気がします。

engChrName: It's too bad the monsters here and there are spoiling such lovely scenery.
engSearchText:
It's too bad the monsters here and there are spoiling
such lovely scenery.
jpnChrName: ただ、魔獣もちらほらといるみたいですけど。
jpnSearchText: ただ、魔獣もちらほらといるみたいですけど。

engChrName: On the plus side, they don't seem as riled up as they did when they attacked that bus.
engSearchText:
On the plus side, they don't seem as riled up as they
did when they attacked that bus.
jpnChrName: でも、バスが襲われた時のような 殺気は感じられませんね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、バスが襲われた時のような
殺気は感じられませんね。

engChrName: As long as we don't go out of our way to provoke them, I don't think they'll be a problem.
engSearchText:
As long as we don't go out of our way to provoke
them, I don't think they'll be a problem.
jpnChrName: わたし達から刺激しなければ 危険は少ないと思います。
jpnSearchText:
わたし達から刺激しなければ
危険は少ないと思います。

engChrName: I agree—just be aware that could change at any moment.
engSearchText:
I agree—just be aware that could change at
any moment.
jpnChrName: ああ、今の所はな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、今の所はな。

engChrName: I don't think enough time's passed since the bus incident for us to let our guards down here. Stay alert.
engSearchText:
I don't think enough time's passed since the bus
incident for us to let our guards down here. Stay alert.
jpnChrName: とはいえ異常があった事は確かだ。 周囲の様子を探りつつ奥に進んでみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ異常があった事は確かだ。
周囲の様子を探りつつ奥に進んでみるぞ。

engChrName: We will!
engSearchText: We will!
jpnChrName: はい、気を付けて行きましょう……！
jpnSearchText: はい、気を付けて行きましょう……！

engChrName: Do you think this is that man's stolen bicycle?
engSearchText: Do you think this is that man's stolen bicycle?
jpnChrName: この自転車は…… 例の盗まれた自転車でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
この自転車は……
例の盗まれた自転車でしょうか？

engChrName: That's what I'd put my money on. It sure wasn't here when we passed in the truck.
engSearchText:
That's what I'd put my money on. It sure wasn't here
when we passed in the truck.
jpnChrName: ああ、間違いねえ。 車で来た時には無かったモンだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、間違いねえ。
車で来た時には無かったモンだからな。

engChrName: It looks to be partially damaged, unfortunately...
engSearchText: It looks to be partially damaged, unfortunately...
jpnChrName: これは……見た所、少し壊れていそうですけど。
jpnSearchText: これは……見た所、少し壊れていそうですけど。

engChrName: ...but at least we can recover it for him.
engSearchText: ...but at least we can recover it for him.
jpnChrName: ひとまず無事に取り戻せた、 という事でいいんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ひとまず無事に取り戻せた、
という事でいいんでしょうか。

engChrName: Now I'm just curious what happened to the man who stole it.
engSearchText:
Now I'm just curious what happened to the man who
stole it.
jpnChrName: 後は自転車を盗んだ犯人が気になりますね……
jpnSearchText: 後は自転車を盗んだ犯人が気になりますね……

engChrName: Yeah. The owner told us the thief said he mentioned needing to run away from something, didn't he?
engSearchText:
Yeah. The owner told us the thief said he mentioned
needing to run away from something, didn't he?
jpnChrName: 確か犯人は、何かから逃げようとして 自転車を盗んだんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
確か犯人は、何かから逃げようとして
自転車を盗んだんですよね。

engChrName: Then why would he just discard it here?
engSearchText: Then why would he just discard it here?
jpnChrName: それなのにどうして、こんな所に 放り出されてるんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
それなのにどうして、こんな所に
放り出されてるんでしょうか？

engChrName: I'm guessin' something happened that they weren't counting on.
engSearchText:
I'm guessin' something happened that they weren't
counting on.
jpnChrName: まあ素直に状況を見れば、 ヤツにとっても想定外の事が起きたんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
まあ素直に状況を見れば、
ヤツにとっても想定外の事が起きたんじゃねえか？

engChrName: This might be a peaceful area, but there's still monsters around. It ain't hard to guess what could've happened.
engSearchText:
This might be a peaceful area, but there's still
monsters around. It ain't hard to guess what
could've happened.
jpnChrName: 穏やかな街道とはいえ、魔獣がうろついてんだ。 想像には難くねえが……
jpnSearchText:
穏やかな街道とはいえ、魔獣がうろついてんだ。
想像には難くねえが……

engChrName: That sounded like a wolf howling!
engSearchText: That sounded like a wolf howling!
jpnChrName: ────！ 狼の遠吠え！？
jpnSearchText:
────！
狼の遠吠え！？

engChrName: I can sense a bunch of monsters around a single point a little ways away!
engSearchText:
I can sense a bunch of monsters around a single point
a little ways away!
jpnChrName: それに、遠くで複数の魔獣の 気配が集まってる感じがしますっ！
jpnSearchText:
それに、遠くで複数の魔獣の
気配が集まってる感じがしますっ！

engChrName: Do you think the bicycle thief is under attack?!
engSearchText: Do you think the bicycle thief is under attack?!
jpnChrName: もしかして自転車泥棒の方が襲われて……！？
jpnSearchText: もしかして自転車泥棒の方が襲われて……！？

engChrName: Could well be. Let's get a move on in the direction we heard that howl from.
engSearchText:
Could well be. Let's get a move on in the direction
we heard that howl from.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ……遠吠えが聞こえた方角に行ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: 仕方ねえ……遠吠えが聞こえた方角に行ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Think we need to speak with the thief before we can call this case closed.
engSearchText:
Think we need to speak with the thief before we can
call this case closed.
jpnChrName: 自転車泥棒のヤツにも 一応事情を聞いておく必要があるだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
自転車泥棒のヤツにも
一応事情を聞いておく必要があるだろうからな。

engChrName: Let's hurry!
engSearchText: Let's hurry!
jpnChrName: はい、急いで向かいましょう！
jpnSearchText: はい、急いで向かいましょう！

engChrName: Grr...
engSearchText: Grr...
jpnChrName: グルルルル…………
jpnSearchText: グルルルル…………

engChrName: Ruff! Ruff!
engSearchText: Ruff! Ruff!
jpnChrName: ヴォン！　ヴォン！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ヴォン！　ヴォン！

engChrName: Well, this is some mess.
engSearchText: Well, this is some mess.
jpnChrName: おっと、この状況は…… なんか込み入ってやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、この状況は……
なんか込み入ってやがるな。

engChrName: It looks like they're fighting over who gets to eat him.
engSearchText: It looks like they're fighting over who gets to eat him.
jpnChrName: 獲物（そこの人）を巡って、魔獣同士で 喧嘩をしてるんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
獲物（そこの人）を巡って、魔獣同士で
喧嘩をしてるんでしょうか？

engChrName: Wha—?! Who are you?!
engSearchText: Wha—?! Who are you?!
jpnChrName: なっ！？　君達は！？
jpnSearchText: なっ！？　君達は！？

engChrName: Oh, like I care who you are! Just help me, please!
engSearchText: Oh, like I care who you are! Just help me, please!
jpnChrName: いや、この際誰でもいい── どうか私を助けてくれッ！
jpnSearchText:
いや、この際誰でもいい──
どうか私を助けてくれッ！

engChrName: They just came at me all of a sudden! They're gonna have me for—
engSearchText:
They just came at me all of a sudden! They're gonna
have me for—
jpnChrName: こいつらが私を襲って来たんだ！ もう少しで食われてしまう所で──！
jpnSearchText:
こいつらが私を襲って来たんだ！
もう少しで食われてしまう所で──！

engChrName: Keep your voice down! You'll just provoke them!
engSearchText: Keep your voice down! You'll just provoke them!
jpnChrName: あっ、そんなに大声を出して刺激しない方が……！
jpnSearchText: あっ、そんなに大声を出して刺激しない方が……！

engChrName: Eeek!
engSearchText: Eeek!

engChrName: Are you okay?!
engSearchText: Are you okay?!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですかっ！？
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫ですかっ！？

engChrName: Not more wolves...
engSearchText: Not more wolves...
jpnChrName: やれやれ、また狼退治かよ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、また狼退治かよ。

engChrName: (There's somethin' off about 'em...)
engSearchText: (There's somethin' off about 'em...)
jpnChrName: （それにこっちの連中は……）
jpnSearchText: （それにこっちの連中は……）

engChrName: Oh! Half of the wolves just ran away!
engSearchText: Oh! Half of the wolves just ran away!
jpnChrName: あっ……片方の狼たちが撤退していきました！
jpnSearchText: あっ……片方の狼たちが撤退していきました！

engChrName: Grr... Ruff! Ruff!
engSearchText: Grr... Ruff! Ruff!
jpnChrName: グルルルル…… ヴォン！　ヴォン！
jpnSearchText:
グルルルル……
ヴォン！　ヴォン！

engChrName: It looks like the other half aren't going to back down so easily, though. Something's really got them in a frenzy.
engSearchText:
It looks like the other half aren't going to back down
so easily, though. Something's really got them in
a frenzy.
jpnChrName: こっちの狼は引き下がりそうにないですね。 なぜか必死というか、鬼気迫る雰囲気です。
jpnSearchText:
こっちの狼は引き下がりそうにないですね。
なぜか必死というか、鬼気迫る雰囲気です。

engChrName: And just look at how red their eyes are! I want to know what's happened to make them this way, but they aren't going to wait for us to find out.
engSearchText:
And just look at how red their eyes are! I want to
know what's happened to make them this way, but
they aren't going to wait for us to find out.
jpnChrName: 目も赤いですし、様子がおかしいですよね…… 気になりますけど交戦するしかなさそうです。
jpnSearchText:
目も赤いですし、様子がおかしいですよね……
気になりますけど交戦するしかなさそうです。

engChrName: At least we don't have to deal with as many of 'em as I thought. Let's do this!
engSearchText:
At least we don't have to deal with as many of 'em as
I thought. Let's do this!
jpnChrName: ハッ、とにかく相手が減っただけ好都合だ。 さっさと片付けちまうぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、とにかく相手が減っただけ好都合だ。
さっさと片付けちまうぞ！

engChrName: Whew... That takes care of them.
engSearchText: Whew... That takes care of them.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……掃討完了ですっ！
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……掃討完了ですっ！

engChrName: Umm... I apologize if I'm wrong, but did you recently steal a bicycle?
engSearchText:
Umm... I apologize if I'm wrong, but did you recently
steal a bicycle?
jpnChrName: ええと……失礼ですが 貴方が自転車を盗んだ方ですよね？
jpnSearchText:
ええと……失礼ですが
貴方が自転車を盗んだ方ですよね？

engChrName: If you did, we'd like to ask you a few questions.
engSearchText: If you did, we'd like to ask you a few questions.
jpnChrName: 申し訳ありませんが、 お話を聞かせてもらえませんか。
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ありませんが、
お話を聞かせてもらえませんか。

engChrName: Y-Yeah, that's me... Go ahead. I'm not gonna try and fight you.
engSearchText:
Y-Yeah, that's me... Go ahead. I'm not gonna try and
fight you.
jpnChrName: あ、ああ…… 大人しくするから勘弁してくれ……
jpnSearchText:
あ、ああ……
大人しくするから勘弁してくれ……

engChrName: (...What was that?)
engSearchText: (...What was that?)

engChrName: (Between the wolves that attacked that bus and the ones we just had to fight, something's definitely not right here.)
engSearchText:
(Between the wolves that attacked that bus and the
ones we just had to fight, something's definitely not
right here.)
jpnChrName: （バスを囲ってきた魔獣といい、さっきのといい、   何かが起きてる事は間違いなさそうだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（バスを囲ってきた魔獣といい、さっきのといい、
何かが起きてる事は間違いなさそうだ。）

engChrName: (It's like they're being controlled by fear somehow... Bah. I just can't put my finger on it.)
engSearchText:
(It's like they're being controlled by fear somehow...
Bah. I just can't put my finger on it.)
jpnChrName: （なんらかの“恐怖”に操られてるっつうか……   チッ、何だろうなこの違和感は。）
jpnSearchText:
（なんらかの“恐怖”に操られてるっつうか……
チッ、何だろうなこの違和感は。）

engChrName: Are you all right, Van?
engSearchText: Are you all right, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、大丈夫ですか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、大丈夫ですか？

engChrName: We still haven't questioned our suspect.
engSearchText: We still haven't questioned our suspect.
jpnChrName: 早速この方から 事情を伺おうと思うんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
早速この方から
事情を伺おうと思うんですけど……

engChrName: Oh, right.
engSearchText: Oh, right.
jpnChrName: おっと、そうだったな。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そうだったな。

engChrName: We're Arkride Solutions. We're here on behalf of a guy who had his bike stolen.
engSearchText:
We're Arkride Solutions. We're here on behalf of a
guy who had his bike stolen.
jpnChrName: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。 自転車を盗まれたヤツから依頼を受けて来た。
jpnSearchText:
俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。
自転車を盗まれたヤツから依頼を受けて来た。

engChrName: We managed to recover it, but I don't think just gettin' that back is gonna satisfy our client.
engSearchText:
We managed to recover it, but I don't think just
gettin' that back is gonna satisfy our client.
jpnChrName: 自転車は取り返したが、 それだけじゃ依頼主も納得できねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
自転車は取り返したが、
それだけじゃ依頼主も納得できねえだろ。

engChrName: Why'd you steal it at all? C'mon, fess up.
engSearchText: Why'd you steal it at all? C'mon, fess up.
jpnChrName: どうして自転車を盗んだんだ？ 素直に白状した方が身のためだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
どうして自転車を盗んだんだ？
素直に白状した方が身のためだぜ。

engChrName: Wha—?! Don't play dumb with me! There's no way you're here on behalf of that guy!
engSearchText:
Wha—?! Don't play dumb with me! There's no way
you're here on behalf of that guy!
jpnChrName: なっ──！？　依頼だと！？ し、しらばっくれるんじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
なっ──！？　依頼だと！？
し、しらばっくれるんじゃない！

engChrName: You came to Creil to shake some mira outta me, didn't you?!
engSearchText:
You came to Creil to shake some mira outta me,
didn't you?!
jpnChrName: 君たちは……いや君は、私を取り立てる為に ここまで追いかけて来たんだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
君たちは……いや君は、私を取り立てる為に
ここまで追いかけて来たんだろう！？

engChrName: ...What are you talking about?
engSearchText: ...What are you talking about?
jpnChrName: 取り立てる……？ 何をでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
取り立てる……？
何をでしょうか？

engChrName: Do you know him, Van?
engSearchText: Do you know him, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、この方と 以前から面識があるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、この方と
以前から面識があるんですか？

engChrName: Nope. I know he was on that bus, but I never met him before that.
engSearchText:
Nope. I know he was on that bus, but I never met
him before that.
jpnChrName: いいや、あのバスの客だって事は知ってるが 今日初めて見るツラだな。
jpnSearchText:
いいや、あのバスの客だって事は知ってるが
今日初めて見るツラだな。

engChrName: What's goin' on?
engSearchText: What's goin' on?
jpnChrName: 一体どういう事だ？
jpnSearchText: 一体どういう事だ？

engChrName: Nope. Never even met him before. What's goin' on?
engSearchText: Nope. Never even met him before. What's goin' on?
jpnChrName: いいや、今日初めて見るツラだな。 一体どういう事だ？
jpnSearchText:
いいや、今日初めて見るツラだな。
一体どういう事だ？

engChrName: What?! Th-That's what I want to know!
engSearchText: What?! Th-That's what I want to know!
jpnChrName: なっ……！？ 聞かせて欲しいのは私の方だ。
jpnSearchText:
なっ……！？
聞かせて欲しいのは私の方だ。

engChrName: Then you're not a debt collector from the companies I owe money to? Really?
engSearchText:
Then you're not a debt collector from the companies I
owe money to? Really?
jpnChrName: 君は……本当に、私が金を借りている 金融会社の取立人じゃないのか……？
jpnSearchText:
君は……本当に、私が金を借りている
金融会社の取立人じゃないのか……？

engChrName: Nope. We're Arkride Solutions, like I just said.
engSearchText: Nope. We're Arkride Solutions, like I just said.
jpnChrName: 言っただろ、取立人じゃねえっつの。
jpnSearchText: 言っただろ、取立人じゃねえっつの。

engChrName: I'm not gonna say we never do debt collection work, but we haven't been asked to come for you, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
I'm not gonna say we never do debt collection work,
but we haven't been asked to come for you, that's
for sure.
jpnChrName: ま、場合によってはそんな仕事を請け負う事もあるが。 今の所アンタの話は来てないぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、場合によってはそんな仕事を請け負う事もあるが。
今の所アンタの話は来てないぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* Oh, Aidios... What a relief. I did all that for nothing...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Oh, Aidios... What a relief. I did all that
for nothing...
jpnChrName: はぁぁぁ～…… 何だ、完全に取り越し苦労じゃないか……
jpnSearchText:
はぁぁぁ～……
何だ、完全に取り越し苦労じゃないか……

engChrName: So the reason you stole that bicycle was because you assumed Van was a debt collector and wanted to run away from him?
engSearchText:
So the reason you stole that bicycle was because you
assumed Van was a debt collector and wanted to run
away from him?
jpnChrName: つまり、貴方はヴァンさんを 取立人と勘違いして逃げようとしていたと？
jpnSearchText:
つまり、貴方はヴァンさんを
取立人と勘違いして逃げようとしていたと？

engChrName: Yeah. I've borrowed a lot of money from a bunch of different places over the years. It's gotten to the point where I'm too deep in to get out...
engSearchText:
Yeah. I've borrowed a lot of money from a bunch of
different places over the years. It's gotten to the point
where I'm too deep in to get out...
jpnChrName: ああ……色々な所から借金をする内に 返しようもない程の負債を抱えてしまってね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……色々な所から借金をする内に
返しようもない程の負債を抱えてしまってね。

engChrName: So I figured my only hope was to flee abroad. That's how I ended up on that bus.
engSearchText:
So I figured my only hope was to flee abroad.
That's how I ended up on that bus.
jpnChrName: 国外逃亡をするしか道はないと思って、 あのバスに乗り込んだんだ……
jpnSearchText:
国外逃亡をするしか道はないと思って、
あのバスに乗り込んだんだ……

engChrName: But I saw you as soon as we arrived in Creil—and I could tell you were a pro.
engSearchText:
But I saw you as soon as we arrived in Creil—and I
could tell you were a pro.
jpnChrName: だけど村に着いた時に、 只者じゃない雰囲気の君を見つけてしまって。
jpnSearchText:
だけど村に着いた時に、
只者じゃない雰囲気の君を見つけてしまって。

engChrName: I was convinced you HAD to be someone who'd come to collect my debts.
engSearchText:
I was convinced you HAD to be someone who'd
come to collect my debts.
jpnChrName: これはもう、私を追いかけて来た 取立人に違いないと思ったんだ……！
jpnSearchText:
これはもう、私を追いかけて来た
取立人に違いないと思ったんだ……！

engChrName: After that, I was just looking for an opportunity to flee as far away as possible.
engSearchText:
After that, I was just looking for an opportunity to
flee as far away as possible.
jpnChrName: だから隙を見て、出来る限り遠くへ 逃げようと思って……
jpnSearchText:
だから隙を見て、出来る限り遠くへ
逃げようと思って……

engChrName: And when that opportunity presented itself, you stole some guy's bike and rode off—only to get surrounded by monsters immediately after.
engSearchText:
And when that opportunity presented itself, you
stole some guy's bike and rode off—only to get
surrounded by monsters immediately after.
jpnChrName: そこで狼の魔獣に襲われちまった訳だな。
jpnSearchText: そこで狼の魔獣に襲われちまった訳だな。

engChrName: Well, I'm glad we were able to clear up that misunderstanding between us.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm glad we were able to clear up that
misunderstanding between us.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、ヴァンさんの誤解が 解けて良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、ヴァンさんの誤解が
解けて良かったです。

engChrName: How about we go back to the village for now, then?
engSearchText: How about we go back to the village for now, then?
jpnChrName: それでは、ひとまず村に戻りませんか？
jpnSearchText: それでは、ひとまず村に戻りませんか？

engChrName: There's no guarantee that more monsters won't come for us—and we need to return that bicycle to its owner.
engSearchText:
There's no guarantee that more monsters won't come
for us—and we need to return that bicycle to
its owner.
jpnChrName: 自転車を返さないといけませんし、 また魔獣が襲ってこないとも限りませんから。
jpnSearchText:
自転車を返さないといけませんし、
また魔獣が襲ってこないとも限りませんから。

engChrName: I think that's a good idea. Don't try and run away from us again, you hear?
engSearchText:
I think that's a good idea. Don't try and run away
from us again, you hear?
jpnChrName: だな、話の続きはそれからだ。 大人しくついて来いよ？
jpnSearchText:
だな、話の続きはそれからだ。
大人しくついて来いよ？

engChrName: I won't. I doubt I could escape from you guys even if I wanted to.
engSearchText:
I won't. I doubt I could escape from you guys even if I
wanted to.
jpnChrName: ああ……分かったよ。 アンタ達から逃げきれる気がしないしな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……分かったよ。
アンタ達から逃げきれる気がしないしな。

engChrName: Then off we go!
engSearchText: Then off we go!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ早速出発ですっ！
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ早速出発ですっ！

engChrName: Hey! Is everyone all right?!
engSearchText: Hey! Is everyone all right?!
jpnChrName: おーい、みなさーん！ 大丈夫だったかーい！
jpnSearchText:
おーい、みなさーん！
大丈夫だったかーい！

engChrName: Kyle! I didn't expect you to leave the village.
engSearchText: Kyle! I didn't expect you to leave the village.
jpnChrName: カイルさん……！ 街道まで出ていらしたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
カイルさん……！
街道まで出ていらしたんですね。

engChrName: You really were sweatin' over that bike, huh?
engSearchText: You really were sweatin' over that bike, huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ、よっぽど自転車の事が 心配だったのかね。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、よっぽど自転車の事が
心配だったのかね。

engChrName: Though I'd be the same if it was my truck, so I can't say I don't get how you feel.
engSearchText:
Though I'd be the same if it was my truck, so I can't
say I don't get how you feel.
jpnChrName: 車の事だと思えば、 気持ちは分からなくもねえが。
jpnSearchText:
車の事だと思えば、
気持ちは分からなくもねえが。

engChrName: I think that about sums up all that happened.
engSearchText: I think that about sums up all that happened.
jpnChrName: ……という事で、色々ありましたけど。
jpnSearchText: ……という事で、色々ありましたけど。

engChrName: Your bicycle is now officially back in your hands— even if it is a little worse for wear.
engSearchText:
Your bicycle is now officially back in your hands—
even if it is a little worse for wear.
jpnChrName: 自転車はお返ししますね。 見たところ修理の必要がありそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
自転車はお返ししますね。
見たところ修理の必要がありそうですが……

engChrName: Whew... Thank you so much. I'm just happy to have it back!
engSearchText:
Whew... Thank you so much. I'm just happy to have
it back!
jpnChrName: ふぅ、本当にありがとう……！ 無事に取り返してくれただけで嬉しいよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、本当にありがとう……！
無事に取り返してくれただけで嬉しいよ。

engChrName: I'm glad we were able to help you!
engSearchText: I'm glad we were able to help you!
jpnChrName: お役に立てたのなら良かったですっ！
jpnSearchText: お役に立てたのなら良かったですっ！

engChrName: Oh, right. I need to ask about how much you charge.
engSearchText: Oh, right. I need to ask about how much you charge.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、依頼料の方もちゃんと 支払わないといけないね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、依頼料の方もちゃんと
支払わないといけないね。

engChrName: I hope I've got enough to cover your costs... If it'll cost more than about 20,000 mira, I might need to pay in installments.
engSearchText:
I hope I've got enough to cover your costs... If it'll
cost more than about 20,000 mira, I might need to
pay in installments.
jpnChrName: で、でも僕の手持ちが少なくてさ…… 数万ミラもするなら分割払いじゃないと……
jpnSearchText:
で、でも僕の手持ちが少なくてさ……
数万ミラもするなら分割払いじゃないと……

engChrName: We don't charge anywhere near that. We're not here to rip you off, y'know.
engSearchText:
We don't charge anywhere near that. We're not here
to rip you off, y'know.
jpnChrName: 大金をむしり取ったりしねえよ。 ウチは別にぼったくりじゃねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
大金をむしり取ったりしねえよ。
ウチは別にぼったくりじゃねえからな。

engChrName: We're a little more expensive than the Bracer Guild, but we only charge for time spent and necessary expenses.
engSearchText:
We're a little more expensive than the Bracer Guild,
but we only charge for time spent and
necessary expenses.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士よりかは割高だが、 時間に見合っただけの料金をもらうだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士よりかは割高だが、
時間に見合っただけの料金をもらうだけだ。

engChrName: R-Really?! What a relief! You're clearly really good at what you do, so I thought you'd charge an arm and a leg.
engSearchText:
R-Really?! What a relief! You're clearly really good at
what you do, so I thought you'd charge an arm and
a leg.
jpnChrName: ほっ……ありがとう！ 凄腕みたいだから、高いのかと思ったよ……
jpnSearchText:
ほっ……ありがとう！
凄腕みたいだから、高いのかと思ったよ……

engChrName: I'll make sure to wire you your money later, then.
engSearchText: I'll make sure to wire you your money later, then.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、ミラは後でちゃんと 振り込ませてもらうね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、ミラは後でちゃんと
振り込ませてもらうね。

engChrName: Right. Then it's time to talk about what to do about our friend here.
engSearchText:
Right. Then it's time to talk about what to do about
our friend here.
jpnChrName: さて、そろそろ コイツの話をさせてもらうが。
jpnSearchText:
さて、そろそろ
コイツの話をさせてもらうが。

engChrName: How do you want us to handle this? If you've got any requests, we're all ears.
engSearchText:
How do you want us to handle this? If you've got any
requests, we're all ears.
jpnChrName: この自転車泥棒の処遇はどうすんだ？ 依頼主に希望があれば従うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
この自転車泥棒の処遇はどうすんだ？
依頼主に希望があれば従うぜ。

engChrName: I-I really am sorry for stealing it! It was all just a stupid misunderstanding on my part.
engSearchText:
I-I really am sorry for stealing it! It was all just a
stupid misunderstanding on my part.
jpnChrName: ぬ、盗んでしまった事は心から反省してるよ！ 本当にすまなかった！
jpnSearchText:
ぬ、盗んでしまった事は心から反省してるよ！
本当にすまなかった！

engChrName: I know! How about I pay these guys in your place? It might take me a while to gather the money, though...
engSearchText:
I know! How about I pay these guys in your place?
It might take me a while to gather the
money, though...
jpnChrName: そうだ！　その依頼料も代わりに私が支払おう！ といってもすぐに用意できるわけではないが……
jpnSearchText:
そうだ！　その依頼料も代わりに私が支払おう！
といってもすぐに用意できるわけではないが……

engChrName: So please, give a guy a break!
engSearchText: So please, give a guy a break!
jpnChrName: だからその、あまり厳しい事は……！
jpnSearchText: だからその、あまり厳しい事は……！

engChrName: Hmm... Well, if he means what he says, my heart says to forgive him.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Well, if he means what he says, my heart says
to forgive him.
jpnChrName: そうだな……そこまで言うなら 許してあげたい所なんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……そこまで言うなら
許してあげたい所なんだけど。

engChrName: It feels like he shouldn't get off almost completely scot-free after stealing someone's property, though...
engSearchText:
It feels like he shouldn't get off almost completely
scot-free after stealing someone's property, though...
jpnChrName: 人の物を盗んでおいて、 特に何のお咎めも無しっていうのもちょっとね……
jpnSearchText:
人の物を盗んでおいて、
特に何のお咎めも無しっていうのもちょっとね……

engChrName: Hmm... You don't have any good ideas on what to do in a situation like this, do you?
engSearchText:
Hmm... You don't have any good ideas on what to do
in a situation like this, do you?
jpnChrName: その、皆さんの方から 何かいい方法はないかな？
jpnSearchText:
その、皆さんの方から
何かいい方法はないかな？

engChrName: Oh, no...
engSearchText: Oh, no...
jpnChrName: そ、そんなぁ……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなぁ……

engChrName: Hmm... I can't think of anything off the top of my head. I know how we'd handle it as warriors, but I know it's not the same here.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I can't think of anything off the top of
my head. I know how we'd handle it as warriors, but I
know it's not the same here.
jpnChrName: うーん、何がいいんでしょうか。 戦士団でのやり方だと違うでしょうし……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、何がいいんでしょうか。
戦士団でのやり方だと違うでしょうし……

engChrName: How about we have him sign some kind of legally binding document? I suspect there's an even better way of handling this, though...
engSearchText:
How about we have him sign some kind of legally
binding document? I suspect there's an even better
way of handling this, though...
jpnChrName: 誓約書を書いてもらう、とかでしょうか？ でも他にもっといい方法があるような……
jpnSearchText:
誓約書を書いてもらう、とかでしょうか？
でも他にもっといい方法があるような……

engChrName: (We're dealin' with a guy who's already on the run from his debts. If we go soft on him, he's not gonna take this seriously.)
engSearchText:
(We're dealin' with a guy who's already on the run
from his debts. If we go soft on him, he's not gonna
take this seriously.)
jpnChrName: （相手は借金取りから逃げてきた野郎だ。   ぬるい方法だと調子に乗りそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（相手は借金取りから逃げてきた野郎だ。
ぬるい方法だと調子に乗りそうだな。）

engChrName: (One option is just to hand him in to the authorities and do this by the book.)
engSearchText:
(One option is just to hand him in to the authorities
and do this by the book.)
jpnChrName: （ここは正当な裁きを受けてもらうか……）
jpnSearchText: （ここは正当な裁きを受けてもらうか……）

engChrName: (Kinda bugs me to leave the client's bike damaged, too. That's not fair on him at all.)
engSearchText:
(Kinda bugs me to leave the client's bike
damaged, too. That's not fair on him at all.)
jpnChrName: （それとも……自転車が壊れたままってのは   依頼主にとっては理不尽な話だろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（それとも……自転車が壊れたままってのは
依頼主にとっては理不尽な話だろう。）

engChrName: (Maybe we could have the thief work here in town to raise the money to repair it?)
engSearchText:
(Maybe we could have the thief work here in town to
raise the money to repair it?)
jpnChrName: （村で働いてでも修理費を工面させるか？   どうしたもんかね……）
jpnSearchText:
（村で働いてでも修理費を工面させるか？
どうしたもんかね……）

engChrName: I'm thinkin' we should do this by the book and let the law handle it.
engSearchText:
I'm thinkin' we should do this by the book and let the
law handle it.
jpnChrName: ここは……司法の判断に任せるか。
jpnSearchText: ここは……司法の判断に任せるか。

engChrName: In other words, hand him in to the police station here in Creil.
engSearchText:
In other words, hand him in to the police station here
in Creil.
jpnChrName: つまり駐在所に突き出すってのはどうだ。
jpnSearchText: つまり駐在所に突き出すってのはどうだ。

engChrName: We managed to recover the bike already, but he still committed a crime. He needs to answer for it.
engSearchText:
We managed to recover the bike already, but he still
committed a crime. He needs to answer for it.
jpnChrName: すぐに取り返せたが、あれは立派な窃盗だ。 これが妥当な罰だと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
すぐに取り返せたが、あれは立派な窃盗だ。
これが妥当な罰だと思うけどな。

engChrName: You make a good point...
engSearchText: You make a good point...
jpnChrName: なるほど、確かにそれが良いかもしれないね。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、確かにそれが良いかもしれないね。

engChrName: Wh-What?!
engSearchText: Wh-What?!
jpnChrName: なっ……なんだって！？
jpnSearchText: なっ……なんだって！？

engChrName: Unfortunately for him, this is gonna make it a lot harder to run from those debt collectors if they do show up.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately for him, this is gonna make it a lot
harder to run from those debt collectors if they do
show up.
jpnChrName: 警察に引き渡されちまったら、取立人から 逃げる事も難しくなるかもしれねえ。
jpnSearchText:
警察に引き渡されちまったら、取立人から
逃げる事も難しくなるかもしれねえ。

engChrName: But that's better than being kicked outta the village and eaten by monsters.
engSearchText:
But that's better than being kicked outta the village
and eaten by monsters.
jpnChrName: だが、村から追放されて また魔獣の餌になるよりはマシだろ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、村から追放されて
また魔獣の餌になるよりはマシだろ。

engChrName: Urgh... I mean, you're right, but...
engSearchText: Urgh... I mean, you're right, but...
jpnChrName: くっ……！ まあ確かにそうなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……！
まあ確かにそうなんだが……

engChrName: *sigh* I guess it is time to pay the piper.
engSearchText: *sigh* I guess it is time to pay the piper.
jpnChrName: はぁ……自転車を盗んだのが運の尽きだったか……
jpnSearchText: はぁ……自転車を盗んだのが運の尽きだったか……

engChrName: I'll go along with him and explain what happened to the officer in charge.
engSearchText:
I'll go along with him and explain what happened to
the officer in charge.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、それじゃあ僕も 一緒に行って事情を説明しないとね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、それじゃあ僕も
一緒に行って事情を説明しないとね。

engChrName: Thanks.
engSearchText: Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、宜しく頼む。
jpnSearchText: ああ、宜しく頼む。

engChrName: We should make our way back to the village now, then.
engSearchText:
We should make our way back to the village
now, then.
jpnChrName: それでは村に戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それでは村に戻りましょうか。

engChrName: Normally, I'd say we should hand him over to the authorities...
engSearchText:
Normally, I'd say we should hand him over to
the authorities...
jpnChrName: 本来なら駐在所に突き出してやる所だが……
jpnSearchText: 本来なら駐在所に突き出してやる所だが……

engChrName: ...but how does makin' him pay for the bike's repairs sound to you?
engSearchText:
...but how does makin' him pay for the bike's repairs
sound to you?
jpnChrName: ここは、自転車の修理費を 払ってもらうってのはどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
ここは、自転車の修理費を
払ってもらうってのはどうだ？

engChrName: Y-You know I don't have that kind of mira, right? Or any at all, for that matter!
engSearchText:
Y-You know I don't have that kind of mira, right?
Or any at all, for that matter!
jpnChrName: だ、だが、私にはミラがないんだぞ……？
jpnSearchText: だ、だが、私にはミラがないんだぞ……？

engChrName: Sure. That's why you'll be working in the village to earn it.
engSearchText:
Sure. That's why you'll be working in the village to
earn it.
jpnChrName: それならクレイユ村で 働いて稼げばいいだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
それならクレイユ村で
働いて稼げばいいだろうが。

engChrName: Wha—?!
engSearchText: Wha—?!
jpnChrName: なっ！？
jpnSearchText: なっ！？

engChrName: That DOES sound good. That way, he'll have time to reflect on what he did, and I won't have to shell out mira for repairs.
engSearchText:
That DOES sound good. That way, he'll have time to
reflect on what he did, and I won't have to shell out
mira for repairs.
jpnChrName: うん、それなら反省してもらいつつ 修理費が浮いて一石二鳥だね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、それなら反省してもらいつつ
修理費が浮いて一石二鳥だね。

engChrName: But I feel like I'll be causing trouble for the people here with this solution...
engSearchText:
But I feel like I'll be causing trouble for the people
here with this solution...
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の人には 迷惑をかけちゃうだろうけど……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の人には
迷惑をかけちゃうだろうけど……

engChrName: I'll help smooth things over with 'em, don't worry.
engSearchText: I'll help smooth things over with 'em, don't worry.
jpnChrName: 住民との“繋ぎ”までは 俺達の方でフォローさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
住民との“繋ぎ”までは
俺達の方でフォローさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Oh, and don't even think of using this as a chance to escape, buddy.
engSearchText:
Oh, and don't even think of using this as a chance to
escape, buddy.
jpnChrName: 言っとくが、その隙に逃げようなんて 思うんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくが、その隙に逃げようなんて
思うんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: If you try that, I'll contact the cops or those debt collectors you got and you'll never be able to go out in public again.
engSearchText:
If you try that, I'll contact the cops or those debt
collectors you got and you'll never be able to go out in
public again.
jpnChrName: その時は警察か取立人に連絡して 二度と大手を振って歩けねえようにしてやるからな。
jpnSearchText:
その時は警察か取立人に連絡して
二度と大手を振って歩けねえようにしてやるからな。

engChrName: Gah...
engSearchText: Gah...
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ……
jpnSearchText: ぐぬぬ……

engChrName: *sigh* I guess this is how things gotta be. Man, I never should have stolen that bike...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I guess this is how things gotta be. Man, I
never should have stolen that bike...
jpnChrName: はぁ……自転車を盗んだのが運の尽きだったか。 仕方ない……言う通りにしよう。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……自転車を盗んだのが運の尽きだったか。
仕方ない……言う通りにしよう。

engChrName: We should make our way back to the village now, then.
engSearchText:
We should make our way back to the village
now, then.
jpnChrName: それでは村に戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それでは村に戻りましょうか。
